questions.question: What is React?
options: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces

questions.question: What is the virtual DOM in React?
options: A lightweight copy of the actual DOM

questions.question: What are props in React?
options: Short for properties, they are inputs to a React component

questions.question: What is state in React?
options: An object that represents the parts of the app that can change over time

questions.question: What is the purpose of useEffect() hook in React?
options: To perform side effects in function components
To handle routing in React applications
To manage state in class components

questions.question: What is the purpose of useState() hook in React?
options: To handle user input in forms
To add state to function components
To add styling to React components

questions.question: What is the purpose of useContext() hook in React?
options: To handle routing in React applications
To access context in function components
To manage state in class components

questions.question: What is the purpose of useRef() hook in React?
options: To handle user input in forms
To create a mutable ref object
To manage state in function components

questions.question: What is the purpose of useMemo() hook in React?
options: To handle routing in React applications
To manage state in class components

questions.question: What is the purpose of useCallback() hook in React?
options: To add styling to React components
To handle user input in forms

questions.question: What is the purpose of componentDidCatch() lifecycle method in React?
options: To handle errors in class components
To manage state in function components
To handle user input in forms

questions.question: What is the purpose of componentWillUnmount() lifecycle method in React?
options: To perform cleanup in class components
To handle user input in forms
To add state to function components

questions.question: What is the purpose of getDerivedStateFromProps() lifecycle method in React?
options: To handle user input in forms
To update state based on props changes in class components
To manage state in function components
